name: Voyage (itch) (Stani_Slav)
description:
CLICK THE SEE-THROUGH FULLSCREEN BUTTON, NOT THE BLUE BUTTON

Note: (This game is still under development, I will be updating this shortly when I finish assembling everything)

Voyage v1.1 is here now, theres a change in how controls work.

First solo game project - controls below

New areas: Stay up in the sky to double your points

left/right arrow keys: move

Space: jump (You can hold space to jump higher)

New dash mechanic: hold shift to dash, you can use it to block bullets and kill enemies for points, killing enemies resets your jump and dash, while also giving a mini jump-boost.

Wooden board: lets the player wall jump off the board (resets jumps)

Red: Obstacle

Green spring: Bouncing on this will give a burst of height

Orange enemy: Flying enemy that shoots bullets, avoid those

New blue enemy: Flying enemy that remains idle, use them to gain height
